subject: Communication
title: False Dilemma: The Illusion of Two Choices
description: A quick win: understand False Dilemma: The Illusion of Two Choices.

hook.text: 'You're either with us or against us.' What if you're neither? What if there are fifty positions in between?

buildup.text: A false dilemma presents only two options when more exist. It forces a binary choice on a non-binary reality.

discovery.text: Politicians love false dilemmas: 'Either we build the wall or the country is overrun.

twist.text: We're psychologically drawn to binary thinking ‚Äî it's simpler.

climax.text: The antidote: always ask 'Are these really the only two options?

punchline.text: When someone gives you only two choices, look for the third.

quiz.question: What does a false dilemma fallacy do?
options: Presents only two options when more exist
